name: Skelby
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: Derek Legge - Yes! Software. Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Original Story:

Skelby is trapped inside a building that's enough to drive any poor droid round the twist. Forced to clear the rooms of nasty squirmers just to earn a can of low grade oil to keep body and electronic soul together, life is made just a little too hazardous by the gravestones that keep appearing in memory of every squirmer that you kill. Even the building is out to hinder our hero's efforts as more and more walls appear to block his free movement.

 Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

Start the game: A
Instructions: B
Move: Cursor keys

Controls in the browser:

Start the game: Z
Instructions: X
Move: Arrow keys

Original game (Commodore 16/Plus4 ) link: https://plus4world.powweb.com/software/Skelby
